prompts: Create a cute bug-type Pokemon that has a round body and fluffy features.
I want a Pokemon that evolves from a small caterpillar into a majestic butterfly.
Generate a Pokemon with a soft, cuddly appearance and vibrant color patterns.
Make an adorable Pokemon that lives in grassy areas and loves to hide among flowers.
Imagine a bug Pokemon with a playful personality and a penchant for collecting shiny objects.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a fluffy ball with big eyes and an inviting smile.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a unique ability to camouflage.
